All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 31 January at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) Detection Technology Field Support has a requirement to purchase new Contraband Field inspection Kits. This Statement of Requirements (SOR) established criteria for the procurement and technical support for contraband field inspection kits that will be used by Border Services Officers (BSO) at Canadian ports of entry for the inspection of various conveyances and commodities. The CBSA has an immediate requirement for the purchase of 19 contraband field inspection kits, to be ordered through a subsequent call-up. The final Standing Offer will include an agreement whereby the CBSA may exercise the irrevocable option to purchase up to 100 additional kits, in one or multiple separate orders.

full_summary:
### PR6378 47419-231262 - Contraband Field Inspection Kit

#### Official Tender Notice

**Reference Number:** WS3773650921-Doc3819764960
**Amendment Number:** 7
**Publication Date:** January 9, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** February 14, 2023, 14:00 EST

**Notice Overview**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is issuing this Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the purchase of Contraband Field Inspection Kits.

**Background**

The CBSA's Detection Technology Field Support is in need of acquiring new Contraband Field Inspection Kits for use by Border Services Officers at Canadian ports of entry for the inspection of various conveyances and commodities.

**Contract Specifications**

The final Standing Offer will include an agreement whereby the CBSA may exercise the irrevocable option to purchase up to 100 additional kits in one or multiple separate orders.

**Contract Details**

* Contract duration: February 24, 2023 – March 31, 2028
* Number of kits: 19 (initial purchase) and up to 100 (additional purchase option)
* Delivery regions: Canada
* Trade Agreements: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and several other trade agreements
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price

**Eligibility Criteria**

This RFSO is open to all suppliers who meet the eligibility criteria outlined in the solicitation document.

**Submission Requirements**

Only electronic submissions (Scanned PDF) will be accepted. Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission by 14:00 EST on January 31, 2023.

**Contact Information**

For any inquiries, please contact Robert Courteau at robert.courteau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Additional Information**

The RFSO is available on the Ariba Discovery portal at the following link: 
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15080228?extsite=MTUwODAyMjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.  [English Only] 

**Disclaimer**

Please note that all bids submitted after 14:00 EST on January 31, 2023, will be considered non-responsive.
